overview: From the deranged mind that brought you Unholy Analog Noisemachine, Crucifix Eye and MxCx now escapes some new sonorous aberration: "Zer0 れい", taking a sharp turn away from previous projects' abrasive volume and harsh tones and into the twilight zone of faulty electronics, outdated synthesizers and stolen samples.
title: Zer0 れい – MIDIHACK
